title: Home
text:
Hi, I’m Joe Edgerton.
I’m a Research Data Management Librarian. I’m a self-taught R person and I love learning about data. Not just analytics, but the curation, storage, and sharing of data. How it’s referred to, how it’s communicated, and how it impacts people.
This site serves as my website for networking and a home for my blog; I want to develop my skills as an information professional and I want to chronicle that journey for others to see.
I’m most active on Mastodon where I follow a lot of GLAM, open source, privacy, and digital humanities folks.

title: Blog
text:
Data term list



Data



Data are in every domain, and so they are also described in every domain. What do some of these terms mean, and what are some references that use these terms.






Sep 15, 2025












Leaving social media



Other



After years of changes to privacy, ads, and algorithms, I’ve decided to leave some of my social media accounts behind and embrace other ones.
